content:
WISER will investigate the impact of weather and 
climate hazards on the Energy Industry â€“ specifically 
focusing on numerical weather prediction, artificial 
intelligence (AI)-based impact modeling, remote 
sensing and vegetation sustainability and system 
and economic modeling. The user-inspired research 
proposed under this IUCRC will provide innovative 
electric grid reliability and resilience solutions to 
renewable energy goals and intensifying 
weather/climate-hazard outage events.
